Name: The Coastal Range
Author: Crypticant
Description: In the foothills of the Worldspine, the Coastal Range stretches north and south just to the west of Griffonshire.

Rooms.Name: Overlooking a Lagoon
Rooms.Description: You are walking along a path that overlooks a large lagoon. The water is a deep blue color and is very still. There are some ducks swimming in the water and you can see fish swimming around. The sky is a beautiful blue color and there are some white clouds. The sun is shining and it is a very beautiful day.

Rooms.Name: Along a Beach Lagoon
Rooms.Description: You see a beautiful sandy beach with a clear blue lagoon. The lagoon is surrounded by palm trees and other tropical vegetation. There are people swimming and sunbathing on the beach. The atmosphere is very relaxed and peaceful.

Rooms.Name: Lower Grasslands
Rooms.Description: You see grassy plains with scattered trees and bushes. There are herds of grazing animals such as bison, pronghorn, and deer. In the distance, You see the gently rolling hills of the Coastal Range.

Rooms.Name: A Jagged Cliff
Rooms.Description: The scene is of a jagged cliff in the mountains. The sun is shining and the sky is clear. There is a stream flowing at the base of the cliff. There are trees and bushes growing on the cliff. There are birds flying in the sky.

Rooms.Name: A Forest Thicket
Rooms.Description: You see a lot of trees and bushes. The ground is covered in leaves and there are some rocks here and there. You don't see any animals, but you can hear birds chirping. The air smells fresh and clean.

Rooms.Name: Among Small Foothills
Rooms.Description: The sun is setting behind the small foothills in the area. The sky is a beautiful orange, and the shadows of the hills are long. The air is warm and the breeze is blowing through the grass. You can hear the sound of birds chirping and the rustling of the leaves. The hills are covered in a variety of trees, including oak and maple. There are also some bushes and wildflowers.

Rooms.Name: A Brushy Forest
Rooms.Description: You are in a collection of trees, bushes, and other plants that are densely packed together. The forest floor is covered in a thick layer of leaves, twigs, and other debris. Sunlight filters down through the trees, casting a dappled light on the ground below. Birds sing from the branches overhead, and small animals scurry through the underbrush. The air is fresh and clean, and the scent of pine needles and damp earth fills the air.

Rooms.Name: Among Grassy Hills
Rooms.Description: You see a lot of grassy hills while . The area is a really beautiful place and it's really quiet and secluded. You also see a lot of trees and wildflowers while you're walking, which is really nice.

Rooms.Name: A Forest Path
Rooms.Description: You see trees of all different sizes and colors. You see a path that is winding and has leaves and sticks on it. The sun is shining through the trees and making the forest look very bright. There are some animals walking around or sitting in the trees.

Rooms.Name: A Grassy Hill
Rooms.Description: You see a grassy hill with some trees nearby. The grass is a deep green, and the trees are a mix of evergreens and deciduous trees. There is a light breeze blowing, and the sun is shining. You can hear the sound of birds singing and the rustling of the leaves in the trees.

Rooms.Name: A Scenic Mountain Overlook
Rooms.Description: The scenery is absolutely breathtaking. You see a huge mountain in the distance with a few trees on it. The sky is a beautiful blue, and the sun is shining. There are some small mountains in the distance as well. The view is simply incredible.

Rooms.Name: A Steep Rocky Ridge
Rooms.Description: You see a rocky ridge that is steep and has a lot of trees. The ground is uneven and there are some small rocks and branches on the ground. The air is fresh and there is a slight breeze. The sky is clear and you can see the sun shining through the trees.

Rooms.Name: A Collapsed Cave
Rooms.Description: You see a cave that has collapsed in on itself. The cave is located in the mountains and is surrounded by trees. There is a stream running through the cave and there are rocks and debris scattered around.

Rooms.Name: A Steep Ascent
Rooms.Description: You see a winding path ahead of you, leading up a steep incline. The path is covered in loose gravel, and there is a drop-off on one side. You can see the valley below, and the mountains in the distance. The air is thin and the sun is bright. You are surrounded by silence.

Rooms.Name: Into Craggy Mountains
Rooms.Description: The craggy mountains are a beautiful sight to see while walking in the Coastal Range. They are tall and have a lot of character. They are also very different from the other mountains in the area.

Rooms.Name: A Hilly Footpath
Rooms.Description: You see a hill with a winding path leading up it. The path is lined with trees and bushes, and there are some rocks and boulders scattered around. The air is fresh and there is a slight breeze blowing.

Rooms.Name: Deep Green Hills
Rooms.Description: You see a dense forest with large trees and a few small ponds. There is a small stream running through the forest. The forest floor is covered in leaves and there is a faint smell of woodsmoke in the air.

Rooms.Name: Within Small Foothills
Rooms.Description: The small foothills in the hills of the northwest are covered in a variety of trees, including evergreens and deciduous trees. The ground is covered in a layer of leaves, pine needles, and other debris. There are small streams and creeks running through the area, and the air is fresh and clean.

Rooms.Name: Deeper Into the Mountains
Rooms.Description: You see a winding dirt path, flanked by tall trees. The path leads up a hill, to a rocky outcropping overlooking a valley. The valley is filled with trees, and a river runs through it. The sun is shining, and the sky is blue.

Rooms.Name: A Small Plateau
Rooms.Description: The view from the small plateau in the mountains is stunning. The mountains themselves are beautiful, and the view of the valley below is breathtaking. The air is fresh and clean, and the sun is shining. The sky is a beautiful blue, and the clouds are white and fluffy.

Rooms.Name: A Sharp Incline
Rooms.Description: You see a winding dirt path leading up a hill, with tall grass on either side. There are trees dotting the landscape, and the sun is shining. You hear the sound of birds chirping and the wind rustling through the grass.

Rooms.Name: A Wide Sewer Pipe
Rooms.Description: You see a wide sewer pipe that is filled with water. The water is flowing quickly through the pipe. You can see some debris in the water, but it is not too bad. The pipe is made of concrete and is very strong.

Rooms.Name: Western Edge of a Rocky Bowl
Rooms.Description: You see a rocky bowl with a few trees and bushes. The sun is shining and the sky is blue. You can hear the sound of the wind blowing through the trees.

Rooms.Name: A Rocky Mountain Bowl
Rooms.Description: You see a rocky mountain bowl with a stream running through it. The stream is surrounded by trees and bushes. There is a path winding through the bowl. You see a few people walking along the path. The sky is clear and blue.

Rooms.Name: A Mountain Switchback
Rooms.Description: You see a narrow path winding its way up a steep mountain. The path is lined with trees and rocks, and there is a small stream running alongside it. You can hear the sound of the stream and the birds in the trees. The air is fresh and cool, and the sun is shining.

Rooms.Name: A Steep Mountain Path
Rooms.Description: You are walking along a narrow path that switchbacks up a steep mountainside. The path is rocky and there are loose stones that you have to watch out for. There is a drop-off on one side of the path, and you can see the valley far below. The air is thin and cold, and you can see your breath. You are surrounded by tall evergreens, and there is a fresh, clean smell.

Rooms.Name: Into the Mountains
Rooms.Description: The sun is shining and the sky is blue. The mountains are covered in snow and there are trees everywhere. You see a few people walking around and a few horses riding by.

Rooms.Name: Ascending a Small Peak
Rooms.Description: You see a small mountain peak in the distance. You are walking along a path that leads to the peak. The path is winding and there are some rocks and boulders along the way. You are surrounded by trees and plants. The air is fresh and you can see the blue sky above.

Rooms.Name: A Faint Mountain Trail
Rooms.Description: You see a faint mountain trail in the mountains on a cloudy day. The trail is covered in fog and the clouds are obscuring the tops of the mountains. There is a sense of mystery and anticipation in the air.

Rooms.Name: The End of the Mountain Trail
Rooms.Description: You see a beautiful landscape with mountains in the distance. The trail is well-maintained and there are plenty of places to rest and take in the scenery. The air is fresh and the sun is shining. You feel relaxed and at peace.

Rooms.Name: A Steep Rock Face
Rooms.Description: You see a steep rock face with a few trees and bushes growing out of it. The ground is covered in loose rocks and gravel. There is a small stream running down the middle of the rock face. You see a few birds flying around and some small animals scurrying about. The air is fresh and clean, and the sun is shining.

Rooms.Name: Below a Cliff
Rooms.Description: You see a rocky cliff face with a few scraggly trees clinging to the sides. There is a small stream winding its way through the rocks at the base of the cliff. The sun is shining and the sky is blue. You can hear the sound of the stream as it flows over the rocks.

Rooms.Name: Across Boulders
Rooms.Description: You see trees, bushes, and rocks. The ground is covered in leaves and there is a stream nearby. You hear the sound of the stream and the wind in the trees. The air is fresh and clean.

Rooms.Name: A Brushy Pine Forest
Rooms.Description: You see a lot of trees and some bushes. The ground is covered in pine needles and there is a light breeze blowing through the trees. The air smells fresh and clean. You hear the sound of birds chirping and the wind rustling through the leaves.

Rooms.Name: A Small Snowy Peak
Rooms.Description: You see a small, snowy peak in the distance, surrounded by a few trees. The ground is covered in snow, and there is a small stream flowing nearby. The air is cold and crisp, and the sky is a deep blue.

Rooms.Name: Atop a Rock Slide
Rooms.Description: You see a rock slide that has occurred in the mountains. There is debris strewn about the area and it appears to be inaccessible.

Rooms.Name: Mountain Foothills
Rooms.Description: You see mountains in the distance, and the sun shining down on the green foothills. There are trees and bushes along the path, and the occasional bird or squirrel. The path is well-worn, and there are rocks and roots sticking up in places. The air is fresh and clean, and you can smell the pine trees.

Rooms.Name: Southeastern Peak Face
Rooms.Description: You see a large peak that is slightly curved and has a few trees on its face. The mountain is mostly covered in snow and there is a small stream running down its side.

Rooms.Name: The Base of a Rockslide
Rooms.Description: You see large rocks that have tumbled down the side of a mountain. Some of the rocks are very large, and some are smaller. There is a lot of rubble and debris around the rocks. You see a few trees that have been knocked over by the rockslide.

Rooms.Name: A Hilly Southern Path
Rooms.Description: You see a hilly southern path with trees and bushes on either side. The path is made of dirt and rocks, and there are leaves and sticks on the ground. The path winds up and down the hills, and there are occasional views of the surrounding countryside.

Rooms.Name: A Steep Mountain Incline
Rooms.Description: You are walking along a narrow path that is bordered by a steep incline on one side and a sheer drop-off on the other. The path is covered in loose gravel, and you have to be careful not to slip. The view from up here is amazing, and you can see for miles.

Rooms.Name: Deeper Into the Hills
Rooms.Description: You see a narrow dirt path winding its way through tall grass and wildflowers. The path is bordered by a dense forest on either side. The air is filled with the sound of birds singing and the rustle of leaves in the breeze. The sun is shining brightly, making the colors of the flowers and trees seem even more vibrant. You can see the peaks of the mountains in the distance, and the blue sky is dotted with white clouds.

Rooms.Name: The Base of a Snowy Peak
Rooms.Description: You see a snowy peak in the mountains, with a base that is covered in snow. There are trees nearby, and the ground is covered in a layer of snow. The air is cold and the sky is clear.
